description: The SubCtech \"Smart Data Interface\" SmartDI™ acquires data from different sensors and take control of production processes as well. During the collection of data the pre-processing validated already the values and passes quality-evaluated data records on according to ISO to back-end systems.. The internal data logging stores up to 5 years continuously highly solvent data on a CompactFlash card. Over telemetry (Rs-232/485, GSM/GPRS/UMTS, WLAN, Ethernet, Bluetooth, IRIDIUM, radio etc.) data are transmitted automatically on-line or at given times. With the SmartDI UW-Logger different sensors and measuring systems, e.g. CTD probes or Meteorology’s can be operated. The modular structure makes a simple and economical adjustment possible to the most diverse applications, which is extensively expandable.
